title: 2 BR Apt close to SUNY Stony brook SBU/Hospital includes all utilities
posting_body: ['PLEASE SEE BELOW FOR PAYMENT SAVINGS OPTIONS.', 'IF AD IS STILL POSTED--THE APARTMENT IS STILL AVAILABLE.', 'For rent: 2 bedroom,1 bath basement apartment.', 'Excellent condition, ceramic tile throughout.', 'Brand new refrigerator.', '1 full size bedroom, and also one smaller bedroom which is perfect for an office/childs room.', 'Close to SUNY stony brook, 8 minutes away.', 'Close to all stores.', 'Located in Centereach.', 'Driveway parking, Separate entrance.', 'Quiet location. includes all utilities and wifi.', '1 months rent +1 month security.', 'No Smoking/No pets.', 'Ideal for SBU student.', 'Available August 15th 2022.', 'THE FOLLOWING RENTAL PAYMENT OPTIONS ARE AVAILABLE.', 'THE PRICE OF RENT IS AS FOLLOWS:', 'OPTION A)—-If you pay a lump sum for a year in advance, the rent drops to $1500/month.', '(Save $450/month) ($18,000 upfront plus 1 month security=$19,500).', 'You will also receive one FREE month of rent.', ' So you would be paying for 12 months and then receive one free month.', ' This is a savings of $4500.', 'OPTION B)—If you pay a lump sum for 6 months rent in advance, the rent is $1750 per month.', '( Save $200/month)', 'This means $10,500 due upfront for 6 months, plus 1 month security= $11,200.', 'Please note that with this option, the next 6 months in advance will be due upfront at the conclusion of the first 6 months)', 'OPTION C)--If you pay on a Monthly basis--the rent is $1950 with 2 months security required.', 'With this option, great or excellent credit is required as well as references and proof of income.', 'No exceptions.', 'Priority will be given to applicants choosing option', 'A', 'ALSO--- please answer the following questions with your email and phone number.', ' Emails without this information will NOT receive a reply.', '1) Who would the apartment be for?', '2) Any pets?', '3) Any smoking?', '4) When are you looking to move?', '5) Which rental option (A or B, or C) are you interested in?', 'Thank you']
